https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vGIdLyOlKTkFM82iNBad9pZYOdM.jpg Judith, an uptight divorcee, is appalled when her daughter Lily quits law school to move into a commune of hippie-misfits who live according to the behavioural principles of the bonobo monkey, a species famous for its 'make love not war' philosophy.
